lines.text: Nice, doctor. While I'm down here trying to save this man's life, you're up there making FART jokes.
There are over twenty bodily fluids present in the human body and I am proud to say I have tasted all of them.
Starting Monday, all nurses must wear underwear.
Relax, relax. Take off your key.
...I thought that you were uh, musically inclined. Do you ever sing? You know or play any, uh, any instrument?
Is that a, a special kind of guitar?

[quoting Simon]
'A romance at this point would be ludicrous and counterproductive to our studies.'
I guess that... might have sounded a little... stuffy, Stephie.
Doctor, I've decided to let you take out an appendix. Gall bladder, whatever...
